Centaur Shaman.baseFlair_: Most mages are endowed with a natural inquisitiveness. Some view the vulnerable nature of a mortal body as a problem—one they undertake to remedy.
Centaur Shaman.evoFlair_: Some mages who fuse with the demons they summon lose their minds. Others can master their new demonic bodies and retain their reason. The difference between the two is paper-thin and lies, perhaps, in that inquisitive spirit.

Hanna, Mysterian Paragon.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Mysterian Knowledge into your hand.
Hanna, Mysterian Paragon.baseFlair_: As your re-elected class president, I'd like to make a pledge! Let's join forces to help shape this academy into an even more splendid place to learn! I know we can do it together!
Hanna, Mysterian Paragon.evoFlair_: Sure the classrooms get blown up sometimes, and students fly through the air... But that's just another part of Mysteria Academy's charm. As class president, I will ensure this academy retains that charm into the next era!

Mechabook Sorcerer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Whenever you play a Machina card, recover 1 play point. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Mechabook Sorcerer.baseFlair_: Core mutations have led to one new optimization after another. Arcane sorcerers can be divided into two groups: practitioners of the arts, and theorycrafters. Mechanized lifeforms fall in a unique space, as they are both. —Research Archives of the Sorcerer's Guild, Vol. 2
Mechabook Sorcerer.evoFlair_:
A new type of magical life-form... As a product, I suppose it is definitely marketable, but the logic behind such a creation needs to be checked out. I think I can provide a more... graceful solution.
—Mechabook Sorcerer to a Mechanized Lifeform

Sweetspell Sorcerer.baseEffect_: Whenever you play a spell, summon a Happy Pig.
Sweetspell Sorcerer.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Evolve all allied Happy Pigs.
Whenever you play a spell, summon a Happy Pig.
Sweetspell Sorcerer.baseFlair_: I'm not actually fond of sweets, you know. If anything, I find them too saccharine for my taste. But the morsels they attract? Why, they're so adorable I could gobble them up. Now how about a nice toffee, my little cream puff?
Sweetspell Sorcerer.evoFlair_: The more treats I conjure, the more they gather. Ahh, just look at them. With every bite their pink cheeks grow rounder. Ooh, they really are adorable. But... they've been eating for hours. Surely they've had more than enough?

Ancient Alchemist.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Earth Rite - Put 3 Conjure Guardians into your hand.
Ancient Alchemist.baseFlair_: A renowned pioneer of modern alchemical methods. Her unquenchable thirst for knowledge is at the root of all her achievements.
Ancient Alchemist.evoFlair_: Perhaps the most refined alchemy adept. Though many follow in her footsteps, none are worthy of stepping into her shoes.

Magic Girl Melvie.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Both players draw cards until each player has 7 cards in their hand.
Magic Girl Melvie.baseFlair_: How do you get to be a princess? I sure don't know, so I'll just start studying everything I can find! How'd you like to join me?
Magic Girl Melvie.evoFlair_: Once I become a princess, I'll meet a handsome prince, and then we'll be together, and then, well—hee-hee-hee! I just can't wait to be a princess!

Falise, Leonardian Mage.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of other Neutral cards in your hand.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Evolve this follower.
Falise, Leonardian Mage.baseFlair_: Being alone is fine with me. Go ahead and make fun of me, but I'm still going to win. That's my whole reason for living.
Falise, Leonardian Mage.evoFlair_: There's no way I'll lose to some grinning fool. I'll win, and everyone will see how great I am!

Wild Golem.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Earth Rite - Gain +1/+2.
At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this X times (up to 10 times). X equals this follower's attack.
Wild Golem.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this X times (up to 10 times). X equals this follower's attack.
Wild Golem.baseFlair_: Do Not Drop Off Golems. —Mysteria Academy signboard
Wild Golem.evoFlair_: Do Not Pick Up Golems. —Mysteria Academy signboard

Class President Hanna.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand: Mysterian Missile or Mysterian Circle. If you have played another Mysteria card this turn, put a Mysterian Rite into your hand instead.
Class President Hanna.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand: Mysterian Missile or Mysterian Circle. If you have played another Mysteria card this turn, put a Mysterian Rite into your hand instead.
Class President Hanna.baseFlair_: It's all about keeping up appearances, they say. As class president, I have to set an example for everyone!
Class President Hanna.evoFlair_: As long as you set your mind to it, surely a bright future awaits you! Come on everybody, let's hit the books!

Chaos Wielder.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Fanfare: Draw 2 cards.
Chaos Wielder.evoEffect_: Evolve: Spellboost the cards in your hand.
Chaos Wielder.baseFlair_: From forbidden techniques to the arcane arts, I embrace all manner of spellcraft... I refuse to discriminate when it comes to knowledge.
Chaos Wielder.evoFlair_: I do not adhere to any one mind-set. Taboo, truth... I'll eat my fill of it all. There is no right or wrong when it comes to knowledge.

Curse Crafter.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Demonic Shikigami. Randomly put 2 different followers with Spellboost from your deck into your hand.
Curse Crafter.baseFlair_:
Just as Onmyodo is on the verge of dying out, a new torchbearer appears. He learns all there is to know about the forces of yin and yang and summons powerful shikigami.
—The Legacy of Onmyodo: Zai
Curse Crafter.evoFlair_:
Nobles and peasants alike are nothing before the shikigami. Onmyodo makes a name for itself once again, spreading throughout the world.
—The Legacy of Onmyodo: Zen

Sun Oracle Pascale.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Earth Rite - At the end of this turn, double all other allied followers' attack and defense if this follower is still in play.
Sun Oracle Pascale.baseFlair_: If you're looking for some motivation, check out my dance! Of course, now that you've seen it, you better win!
Sun Oracle Pascale.evoFlair_: If any fools give you lip, give 'em a beatdown! What? You think I should watch my mouth? Well, I suppose you might be right.

Wizardess of Oz.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Draw cards until there are 5 cards in your hand. Change the cost of the spells without Spellboost in your hand to 1.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, banish all spells in your hand.
Wizardess of Oz.evoEffect_: Last Words: At the start of your next turn, banish all spells in your hand.
Wizardess of Oz.baseFlair_: Longface, Fanged Beast, the Sighing Beauty, or the Crimson Rose. Call me what you will. I am the void. I am a fiction. I am everyone and no one at all.
Wizardess of Oz.evoFlair_: If you believe in the flickering nothing, I will give you a brain, give you a heart, and give you courage. I kneel before truth, and rule over the nothing.

Mysteria, Magic Founder.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Your spells deal +1 damage. (This effect lasts for the rest of the match.)
Mysteria, Magic Founder.baseFlair_: Bestow upon them eyes to witness the miracles of magic, ears to hear the melodies of magic, and the heart to command it.
Mysteria, Magic Founder.evoFlair_: To those who cast in my name, bring forth the magic within. It's always around us, and always with you.

Truthseeker Faust.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, if an allied follower is in play, perform Earth Rite: Give +2/+1 to a random allied follower. (This effect lasts for the rest of the match.)
Truthseeker Faust.baseFlair_: There's nothing to fear; you can spit it out! Let the desire spiral wildly within you. I'm ready to love, and coyness is the last thing I need.
Truthseeker Faust.evoFlair_: Every desire is a possibility. Stay true to yourself, humans. Stay thirsty, animals. If you can just do that, I'll show you the way.

Orichalcum Golem.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Earth Rite (X) - Randomly activate 1 of the following effects. Do this X times. X equals the number of allied Earth Sigil amulets in play.
-Summon a Clay Golem.
-Put a Veridic Ritual into your hand.
-Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
----------
Last Words: Summon 2 Earth Essences. Put an Orichalcum Golem into your hand and change its cost to 7.
Orichalcum Golem.evoEffect_: Last Words: Summon 2 Earth Essences. Put an Orichalcum Golem into your hand and change its cost to 7.
Orichalcum Golem.baseFlair_:
There is beauty in inevitability. But beauty and truth are very different things. Those seemingly forged of happenstance still play their part in the greater, unchanging design.
—Chapter 4, On Golems
Orichalcum Golem.evoFlair_:
Third-rate mages rely on chance.
Second-rate mages try to eliminate it.
Only when you learn to control chance can you call yourself a first-rate mage.
—Chapter 5, On Golems

Medea, Ritual Sorceress.baseEffect_:
Fanfare and Last Words: Summon a Witch's Cauldron.
Enhance (8): Summon a Guardian Golem and recover 1 evolution point.
Medea, Ritual Sorceress.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Earth Rite - Transform an enemy follower or amulet into a Clay Golem.
Last Words: Summon a Witch's Cauldron.
Medea, Ritual Sorceress.baseFlair_: Ignorance. I won him the golden fleece. I stepped aboard the Argo. I, who foolishly, foolishly gave over my heart, now cling to the rail of this narrow ship, as the currents toss me. That was my ignorance.
Medea, Ritual Sorceress.evoFlair_: Destiny. I shall burn Glauce. I will abandon Iolcus. You, wretched, wretched lover, shall grow dizzy in my embrace. This was always our destiny.

Fate's Hand.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Draw 2 cards.
Fate's Hand.baseFlair_: When these cards reach enchantment, fate will move once again.

Chain Lightning.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to an enemy. Put a Chain Lightning into your hand if you have 3 other cards or less in your hand.
Chain Lightning.baseFlair_: It struck without warning, nary a cloud in the sky.

Staff of Whirlwinds.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. Then deal 1 damage to all enemies.
Staff of Whirlwinds.baseFlair_: Your mother never slapped you, so my winds will have to do the trick! Learn yet? Now get lost! —A mage of winds

Golem's Rampage.baseEffect_:
Summon 2 Clay Golems.
Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of allied Clay Golems in play.
Earth Rite: Give +1/+1 to all allied Clay Golems.
Golem's Rampage.baseFlair_: Golem assembly must be conducted perfectly. First comes prayer, then parchment and pure silver, and finally the incantation. Take care not to confuse the steps. Tragically, many mages have been crushed by their own golems. —Golem Basics: A Primer, Chapter 8

Mysterian Rite.baseEffect_:
Whenever you play a Mysteria card, if this card costs 5 play points, change its cost to 3.
----------
Deal 3 damage to an enemy.
Summon a Guardian Golem.
Mysterian Rite.baseFlair_: Worry not, my beloved students. Your days of study and training will be the key to unlocking the secrets of magic. —Seraph of Mysteria

Golem Protection.baseEffect_:
Summon a Guardian Golem.
Earth Rite: Give +2/+2 to allied Guardian Golems.
Golem Protection.baseFlair_: Clumps of earth, heed my call and be my shield!

Disintegration.baseEffect_:
Banish an enemy follower.
If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, recover 4 play points.
Disintegration.baseFlair_: The culmination of millions of happenstances brought you into existence. It would only take one more to take you out of it.

Winter's Caprice.baseEffect_: Transform each follower into a Snowman.
Winter's Caprice.baseFlair_: They look better in white anyway, don't you think?

Rimewind.baseEffect_:
Return an enemy follower with 1 defense or less to the opponent's hand and summon 1 Snowman.
Spellboost: Followers with 1 more defense can be returned and summon 1 more Snowman.
Rimewind.baseFlair_: The witch's breath coalesced into a bitter snowstorm.

Conjuring Force.baseEffect_: Whenever you play a spell, give +1/+0 to all allied followers.

Emergency Summoning.baseEffect_:
When your opponent plays a follower, destroy this amulet.
Last Words: Summon a Guardian Golem and a Clay Golem.
Emergency Summoning.baseFlair_: A little late now, aren't we? —Accomplished Mage

Reactive Barrier.baseEffect_:
When your opponent plays a spell, destroy this amulet.
Last Words: Draw 3 cards and restore 3 defense to your leader.

Master Alchemist.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Earth Rite - Put a Conjure Guardian into your hand.
Master Alchemist.baseFlair_: Our combined thirst for knowledge was the key to unlocking the arcane mysteries of the God of Creation's methods.
Master Alchemist.evoFlair_: Do I fear what depravities may come as a result of my unnatural creations? Not if they can stop my old companion who was claimed by the darkness.

Spurned Witch.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
Spurned Witch.baseFlair_: Hear me, insatiable staff! Feed on the flesh of all those who saw me banished to oblivion!
Spurned Witch.evoFlair_: My gratitude alone will never sate your appetite, so this I pledge: we shall walk this land together until you hunger no more.

Blade Mage.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Storm.
Blade Mage.baseFlair_: You've gone too far, vile beasts. We cannot allow you to continue. My blade will be your judge, jury, and executioner.
Blade Mage.evoFlair_: Flee and be cut down or surrender and be cut down. It makes no difference to me, as your death is foreordained. Our targets never escape justice, so say goodbye.

Astrologist of the Mist.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If another allied follower is in play, perform Earth Rite - Give +1/+1 and Ward to an allied follower.
Astrologist of the Mist.baseFlair_: The people's wishes call to the stars; the stars' light calls for these wishes. Wishes are the bridge that connect us with the stars.
Astrologist of the Mist.evoFlair_: If people forget the stars, then stars will forget the people. I continue praying to the star globe so this doesn't happen.

Gem Golem.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Earth Rite - Gain resistance to targeted enemy spells and effects.
Gem Golem.baseFlair_: Shielding the advancing army all the while, a magic-powered giant laid siege to its enemies. Not even the mightiest sorcery could halt it.
Gem Golem.evoFlair_: Across the battlefield there strode a giant, a living shield to protect its allies from the magical onslaught of fire, ice, and lightning.

Witchcrafter Magisa.baseEffect_: Whenever you play a spell, summon a Clay Golem.
Witchcrafter Magisa.evoEffect_: Whenever you play a spell, summon a Clay Golem.
Witchcrafter Magisa.baseFlair_: It's your lucky day. I rarely agree to perform a private magic show. Tell me, you don't get the chills easily, do you?
Witchcrafter Magisa.evoFlair_: Oh, don't you be embarrassed. I have a knack for bewitching all my first-timers. Sit a while, won't you? I'll craft you up somethin' good.

Shadow Witch.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Earth Rite - Transform an enemy follower or amulet into a Clay Golem.
Shadow Witch.baseFlair_: You're repulsive! This new form suits you better.
Shadow Witch.evoFlair_: You're just so repulsive! I'll do us both a favor and put you out of your misery.

Disaster Witch.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Crimson Sorcery into your hand.
Disaster Witch.baseFlair_: An intruder? In my castle? Well, I suppose I'll welcome them by making them comfortable... and of course warm. Immolated even!
Disaster Witch.evoFlair_: You're a brave one... and incredibly stupid. I once razed a city in an instant, and I'll do the same to you!

Mr. Heinlein, Shadow Mage.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: If there are cards in your hand that have been Spellboosted fewer than 5 times, Spellboost those cards until they have been Spellboosted a total of 5 times.
Mr. Heinlein, Shadow Mage.baseFlair_: You mustn't, my students, discount the field of shadow magic. It's able to destroy any object and lead people's hearts astray.
Mr. Heinlein, Shadow Mage.evoFlair_: It seems there are some of you, my students, who don't yet understand the power of shadow magic. So allow me to demonstrate its terrible potential!

Mysterian Whitewyrm.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Mysterian Circle into your hand. Give all Mysteria spells in your hand the following effect - Draw 1 card.
Mysterian Whitewyrm.baseFlair_: Turn, my flesh, into a whitewyrm. I shall shine the light of purification on the ignorant ones who set foot in this house of learning.
Mysterian Whitewyrm.evoFlair_: The art of wyrmification is forbidden, but if this power can protect the future, then I'll wield the light any number of times!

Mysterian Blackwyrm.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Mysterian Missile into your hand. Give all Mysteria spells in your hand the following effect - Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Mysterian Blackwyrm.baseFlair_: Turn, my flesh, into a blackwyrm. I shall pour the dark of destruction on the wicked ones who defile the house of learning.
Mysterian Blackwyrm.evoFlair_: The art of wyrmification is forbidden, but if this power can destroy evil, then I'll release the darkness any number of times!

Eldritch Chimera.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Can't be destroyed by spells and effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from spells and effects.)
Eldritch Chimera.baseFlair_: I've made my choice. You'll be trampled by this one. —Abyss Summoner
Eldritch Chimera.evoFlair_: I've made my choice. You can be decimated to bits by this one. —Abyss Summoner

Eldritch Demon.baseEffect_:
Storm.
At the end of your turn, restore 3 defense to this follower.
Eldritch Demon.baseFlair_: I've made my choice. You'll be breakfast for this one. —Abyss Summoner
Eldritch Demon.evoFlair_: I've made my choice. You can be a sacrifice for this one. —Abyss Summoner

Professor of Taboos.baseEffect_:
Whenever an enemy follower is destroyed during your turn, summon a Zombie.
At the end of your turn, perform Earth Rite: Destroy a random enemy follower.
Professor of Taboos.evoEffect_:
Whenever an enemy follower is destroyed during your turn, summon a Zombie.
At the end of your turn, perform Earth Rite: Destroy a random enemy follower.
Professor of Taboos.baseFlair_: If it means saving my daughter, I would never hesitate to turn to the forbidden arts, even if doing so is unforgivable.
Professor of Taboos.evoFlair_: Forbidden arts. Blasphemy. The gods will likely never forgive me. And yet those same gods failed to save my sweet daughter, so I must!

Master Mage Levi.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy.
Fanfare: Earth Rite - Deal 3 damage to all enemies instead.
Master Mage Levi.baseFlair_: Who am I? Humph! If it matters to you, I'm the greatest mage in all the world.
Master Mage Levi.evoFlair_: The man who stands before you has explored the ultimate limits of magic. If you value your life, step away from me!

Hulking Giant.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Discard all Earth Sigil amulets from your hand and gain +2/+2 for each discarded card.
Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
Hulking Giant.evoEffect_: Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
Hulking Giant.baseFlair_: Begin with nothing. Then infuse a magical soul into a lump of earth to create a golem, which is something. Next magically enhance the golem until it grows into a giant. That giant will crush all before it, leaving you with nothing. —Introduction, The Basics of Truth
Hulking Giant.evoFlair_: The secrets of alchemy lie in focus and forgetfulness. You should focus only on how to succeed at creation and forget about controlling what you create. Keep this in mind and you'll create something great indeed. —Chapter 3, The Basics of Truth

Arulumaya, Mystic Seer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, if there are at least 6 cards in your hand, Spellboost the cards in your hand; if there are 5 cards or less in your hand, draw cards until there are 6 cards in your hand. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Arulumaya, Mystic Seer.evoEffect_: Evolve: If there are at least 6 cards in your hand, Spellboost the cards in your hand; if there are 5 cards or less in your hand, draw cards until there are 6 cards in your hand.
Arulumaya, Mystic Seer.baseFlair_: I'm sorry, but I use my powers for the people. I don't divine for individuals. But suppose I told you that calamity awaits you on your journey... Would you give everything up?
Arulumaya, Mystic Seer.evoFlair_: There is a future I cannot see, one in which the world will tremble as it hurtles toward the crossroads of fate. You, the bearer of this destiny... Which path will you choose? I ask that you let me watch over you as you continue your journey.

Despondent Chimera.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower if this card has been Spellboosted at least 6 times.
Then, recover 3 play points if this card has been Spellboosted at least 9 times.
Then, gain Storm if this card has been Spellboosted at least 12 times.
Despondent Chimera.baseFlair_: Their transgressions piled on as they lost sight of their ethics and morals. What was once the desire for truth was twisted into a depraved pleasure. Before long, they entered a realm inhuman.
Despondent Chimera.evoFlair_: Their transgressions grew inhumane as they thirsted for the forbidden fruit. But the aftermath was an unmistakable anomaly—they awakened to the sound of an unspeakable horror, finally coming to realize their mistakes.

Sweet-Tooth Medusa.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon 1 Serpent.
Spellboost: Summon 1 more.
If this card has been Spellboosted at least 7 times, summon a Medusiana instead.
Sweet-Tooth Medusa.baseFlair_:
Magical Girl Sweet-Tooth Medusa is on the scene! Love and passion! Sugar Time! Magical Light... Sparking!
Phew! Being a magical girl sure isn't easy!
Sweet-Tooth Medusa.evoFlair_:
Hate will never be enough to defeat the forces of evil! So I'll wrap them up in my love!
Evildoers the world over... I'll send you back where you came from!

Erasmus, Master Summoner.baseEffect_:
At the end of your turn, deal 4 damage to a random enemy follower.
At the end of your turn, perform Earth Rite: Deal 4 damage to the enemy leader.
Erasmus, Master Summoner.baseFlair_: The men retreated in terror as a master of arcane spells stood before them. "Heh," the wizard chuckled with mild amusement, "this should make for a good warmup." —Ancient War Records, Recovered Fragment
Erasmus, Master Summoner.evoFlair_: The wizard's spells blew them away in a single breath. Seeing the men fall so easily before him, he sighs in disappointment. It seems he had only just begun. —Ancient War Records, Recovered Fragment

Karyl, Catty Sorceress.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Reduce the enemy leader's maximum defense by 5.
Union Burst (10): Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower and then 1 damage to the enemy leader. Do this 5 times.
Karyl, Catty Sorceress.evoEffect_: Evolve: Destroy all enemy followers with 3 defense or less.
Karyl, Catty Sorceress.baseFlair_: Geez... Fine! I'll help you fight, so you'd better be grateful! But get in my way, and it's all over for you. Got it?
Karyl, Catty Sorceress.evoFlair_: The truth is, I can't let myself get too close to them. If anything were to happen to them, I'd be the one to suffer... What's that look for? You got a problem?

Adamantine Golem.baseEffect_:
During your turn, when this card is added to your hand from your deck, if there are 2 allied Earth Sigil amulets or less in play, reveal it and summon an Earth Essence.
----------
Fanfare: Randomly activate 1 of the following effects. Earth Rite (X): Do this X more times. X equals the number of allied Earth Sigil amulets in play.
-Summon a Guardian Golem.
-Put a Witch Snap into your hand and change its cost to 0.
-Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader. Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Adamantine Golem.baseFlair_:
Curiosity is the hallmark of a researcher. One idea inspires ten theories which are then honed by one hundred experiments, and then at last—eureka! The history of magic is built on moments such as these.
—On Golems (New Edition), Chapter 2
Adamantine Golem.evoFlair_:
It took mankind a hundred flashes of inspiration to form armies to defend their common interest. It took ten to hone an affinity for the arcane. But it only takes one for magic to thrive and stay alive.
—On Golems (New Edition), Chapter 3

Truth's Adjudication.baseEffect_:
Summon a Guardian Golem and give it +X/+X. Deal Y damage to the enemy leader. Restore Z defense to your leader.
X, Y, and Z equal the number of times this card has been Spellboosted, split randomly between the three effects.
Truth's Adjudication.baseFlair_: The gates of truth are fashioned from the nature, instinct, and reality of this plane. Throw them open, and never shall they close again.

Crimson Meteor Storm.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to all enemy followers.
If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, put a Crimson Sorcery into your hand.
Crimson Meteor Storm.baseFlair_: A witch's patience: mage slang for something that doesn't exist.

Arcane Enlightenment.baseFlair_: Mysteries are like little treasure chests of truth. Without a key they're worse than useless. But with one their significance is limitless.

Calamitous Curse.baseEffect_:
Banish all enemy followers with 2 defense or less.
Earth Rite: Banish all enemy followers with 5 defense or less instead.
Calamitous Curse.baseFlair_: Though the armored horde bellowed, the wizard needed only to murmur.

Mutagenic Bolt.baseEffect_: Transform each enemy follower into a Flame Rat.

Grand Summoning.baseEffect_:
Earth Rite: Give +1/+0 to all allied followers, including followers summoned by this card.
Summon a Guardian Golem, a Clay Golem, and a Scrap Golem.
Grand Summoning.baseFlair_: Do not grieve my departure when my time in this world ends. I shall bestow upon you a new companion, born from this earth.

Second Curse.baseEffect_:
Deal 5 damage to an enemy follower.
Put a Final Curse into your hand.
Second Curse.baseFlair_: This unyielding curse echoes again and again.

Servant of Truth.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
Servant of Truth.baseFlair_: Our way is truth. Yours is deception. Your name, your rank, even your intentions—all deceit. Cast them aside and the truth will reveal itself to you.
Servant of Truth.evoFlair_:
The First Rite: Know Thy Deception
This world is rife with falsehood. Lies, fabrications, and guile—the untrue takes many forms. Thou must know them all.
—Teachings of the Assembly of Truth

Traditional Sorcerer.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Fanfare: Summon a Paper Shikigami.
Whenever an allied Paper Shikigami or Demonic Shikigami comes into play, give it Ward.
Traditional Sorcerer.evoEffect_: Whenever an allied Paper Shikigami or Demonic Shikigami comes into play, give it Ward.
Traditional Sorcerer.baseFlair_:
Onmyodo is not merely a form of divination—it is power. With a talisman and a string of words, the user can bend monstrosities and calamities to their will.
—The Legacy of Onmyodo: Sha
Traditional Sorcerer.evoFlair_:
As the true potential of Onmyodo comes to light, it begins to see use in battle. Swords are no match for its power, and it shatters armor with ease. A single strike is able to take out numerous enemies.
—The Legacy of Onmyodo: Kai

Dragonbond Mage.baseEffect_: Whenever you play a spell, summon a Dragon.
Dragonbond Mage.evoEffect_: Whenever you play a spell, summon a Dragon.
Dragonbond Mage.baseFlair_: Most mages' origins are steeped in mystery. This one's, however, is not—he made a blood pact with a dragon deity.
Dragonbond Mage.evoFlair_: To gain the trust of a dragon god, one must command unrivaled sorcery. Do so, and aerial domination will be all but assured.

Snowman King.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Summon 1 Snow Knight or {1@Wild Snowman@Wild Snowmen}. Spellboost: Summon 1 more.
Snowman King.baseFlair_: This winter sure's nasty! Someone, anyone! Come warm up your king!
Snowman King.evoFlair_: Hohoho, that's better. I'm nice and toasty now. Huh, now you're chilly? Well, how about you think of someone beside yourself?

Bergent, Onion Patchmaster.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon an Onion Patch. Give your leader the following effect - Whenever you play a spell, summon an Onion Patch. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Bergent, Onion Patchmaster.baseFlair_: The world rejected me, so I'll reject the world. I've said it, and I mean it! Now come here, my beautiful little servants!
Bergent, Onion Patchmaster.evoFlair_: Gwaaah, why won't anything go my way? I'm not going to give up though. I'll destroy this whole world no matter what!

Ms. Miranda, Light Mage.baseEffect_:
Whenever you play a Mysteria card, subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
---------
Fanfare: Randomly put a Mysterian Missile or Mysterian Circle into your hand.
Ms. Miranda, Light Mage.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a Mysterian Rite into your hand.
Ms. Miranda, Light Mage.baseFlair_: Hi there, everyone! I'm Ms. Miranda, your light arts teacher! But you can just call me Mira!
Ms. Miranda, Light Mage.evoFlair_: In order to really understand my students, it's all about appearances, right? Well, how's this? It doesn't fit quite like it used to, but I think it'll be okay. Yay!

Morra, Monika's Familiar.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Recover 1 evolution point.
----------
Fanfare: Summon a Lovely-Heart Monika. Recover 1 evolution point.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, put a Morra, Monika's Familiar into your hand.
Morra, Monika's Familiar.evoEffect_: Last Words: At the start of your next turn, put a Morra, Monika's Familiar into your hand.
Morra, Monika's Familiar.baseFlair_: We help magical girls turn their love and hope into power! That's the job of us familiars! So you've gotta dream big, Monika—and love even bigger! I'll be able to give you tons of power then!
Morra, Monika's Familiar.evoFlair_: A pure heart, a sweet costume change, and a metric fluff ton of unyielding love—Monika, everything you need to be magical is inside of you! Now... Transform!

Raio, Omen of Truth.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Spellboost all the cards in your deck 9 times.
Raio, Omen of Truth.baseFlair_: Drenched in the rain of knowledge, where dost thou wander? Why deceive thyself with intentions and ambitions? 'Tis inane affectation. Expose thyself to the deepest truths—the qualities, faculties, and reality of this plane. And then... I shall put this world to trial.
Raio, Omen of Truth.evoFlair_: To want for purpose is deception; to wish for meaning is deceit. Understand the deepest truths and thou shalt manifest only that which must be. And then... I shall put this world to trial.

Apex Elemental.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Return an allied amulet to your hand and deal 2 damage to an enemy follower. If the returned card is a Naterran Great Tree, deal 3 damage instead.
(Can be played only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: If any allied amulets are in play, return 1 to your hand and deal 2 damage to all enemy followers. If the returned card is a Naterran Great Tree, deal 3 damage instead.
Apex Elemental.baseFlair_: Wind, water, fire, earth. Volatility, conservation, ascension, and gravity. Domains of the Sylphs, Undines, Salamandra, and Gnomes. Four elements who write the very laws of existence. Surpass this world and redefine it as you will.
Apex Elemental.evoFlair_: Wind, water, fire, earth. Volatility, conservation, ascension, and gravity. Domains of the Sylphs, Undines, Salamandra, and Gnomes. Four pinnacles which orchestrate existence. Surpass this world, and bestow unto us your gestalt.

Ultimate Clay Golem.baseEffect_: This follower can evolve for 0 evolution points.
Ultimate Clay Golem.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - During your turn, whenever an allied Clay Golem comes into play, transform it into an Ultimate Clay Golem. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Ultimate Clay Golem.baseFlair_:
Oooo!
(Humanity... Foolish creators. I stand before you as the manifestation of truths, born from the depths of wisdom—the absolute golem to reign supreme. Now behold, as I prove to you all the strength of my will.)
Ultimate Clay Golem.evoFlair_:
Oooo, ooo!
(Humanity... Lonesome creators. My mothers, my fathers stuck in the quagmire of reason. I have already surpassed you. Now witness, as I show the ultimate truth!)

Twin Guardians.baseEffect_: Summon 2 Guardian Golems. Earth Rite: Give +1/+1 to allied Guardian Golems.
Twin Guardians.baseFlair_: Alchemists build walls that have wills of their own. That's the difference between us and carpenters.

Expel Soul.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower. Draw 1 card.
Spellboost: Draw 1 more.
Expel Soul.baseFlair_: Pain, pain, go away. See, now doesn't that feel better?

Alchemical Lore.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to all enemy followers.
Alchemical Lore.baseFlair_: There's no need for the power of tigers. Not when you can just summon a dragon.

Multipart Experiment.baseEffect_:
Summon 1 Clay Golem.
Spellboost: Summon 1 more.
Multipart Experiment.baseFlair_: Quantity over quality! Am I right or am I right?

Enchanted Sword.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Give +2/+2 to an allied follower.
Enchanted Sword.baseFlair_: Feel the power of the enchanted sword!

Edict of Truth.baseEffect_:
Draw cards until there are 9 cards in your hand.
If this card has been Spellboosted at least 9 times, recover 7 play points.
Edict of Truth.baseFlair_: Hear me, all living creatures: Be governed by instinct. Open wide your slavering jaws to devour sadness and joy alike. Only then shall we seize upon the truth.

Seal of Solomon.baseEffect_: Randomly put 1 of the highest-cost followers that cost X play points or less from your deck into your hand and change its cost to 0. X equals the number of times this card has been Spellboosted.
Seal of Solomon.baseFlair_: A mere fragment of the king's infinite wisdom.

Juno's Secret Laboratory.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: Earth Rite - Summon a Guardian Golem.
At the end of your turn, summon a Guardian Golem.
Juno's Secret Laboratory.baseFlair_: Whoa, this could be huge! What's that word again? Oh yeah—eureka!

Arcane Item Shop.baseEffect_:
Invocation: At the start of your tenth turn or later, if you can evolve and have at least 1 evolution point, use 1 evolution point and invoke this card.
Until this amulet leaves play give your leader the following effects: Whenever you play a card deal 2 damage to a random enemy. Whenever you play a card, if there are no followers in your deck, recover 1 play point.
Arcane Item Shop.baseFlair_: A faint, insinuating voice guides your footsteps, and you find yourself before an unassuming storefront. Inside that establishment long forgotten by the masses, you feel the heat of countless stares. Selections here are made by the items, you realize, not the customers.

Magiblade Witch.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Summon an Earth Essence.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to 2 random enemy followers.
Magiblade Witch.baseFlair_: Tremble in fear before my power! O, brilliant red! Dwell within my hand and shine... Huh? You think my incantation's too long? That's my strategy, silly! Enemies think I'm going to cast a spell, so they drop their guard and get closer... Then I just use my sword instead!
Magiblade Witch.evoFlair_: As a magic user who wields a sword, there are a lot of things I'd like to say to her... But there's no point preaching to a mage that they're doing it wrong. —Blade Mage

Twinblade Mage.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Storm.
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
Twinblade Mage.baseFlair_: The righteous mage witnessed it for himself—a bane his sword could not break. An eye for an eye, a curse for a curse. The knight's two swords seemed to bring down a curse on the accursed beasts.
Twinblade Mage.evoFlair_: The wielder shows no mercy to those who would be cut down, for the twin blades that mete out curses on the accursed beasts. The justice he believed has long perished, but his determination is undying.

Abyss Summoner.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If you have 20 cards or less in your deck, Choose - Summon an Eldritch Chimera or Eldritch Demon.
Abyss Summoner.baseFlair_: It's all about method and attention to detail, you know. I guess you could call it dedication to the craft? Anyway, I'm obviously gonna destroy you here, so... Which pup should I do it with?
Abyss Summoner.evoFlair_: Sure, a result is something you can be proud of, but the process is something you can really savor. Anyway, clearly you're gonna get torn to shreds here—just give me a second to choose how.

Demoncaller.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Fanfare: Summon a Demonic Shikigami.
Whenever an allied Paper Shikigami or Demonic Shikigami comes into play, give it +1/+0 and Rush.
Demoncaller.evoEffect_: Whenever an allied Paper Shikigami or Demonic Shikigami comes into play, give it +1/+0 and Rush.
Demoncaller.baseFlair_:
The people grow suspicious of Onmyodo. It is not truth as they had once thought, but power. What kind of power, none can say.
—The Legacy of Onmyodo: Jin
Demoncaller.evoFlair_:
The number of Onmyodo practitioners is small. They are unable to defend themselves from the pointed words of so many. Having lost the trust of the people, they are driven from the capital.
—The Legacy of Onmyodo: Retsu

Anne, Belle of Mysteria.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Grea the Dragonborn and evolve it.
Anne, Belle of Mysteria.evoEffect_: Strike: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
Anne, Belle of Mysteria.baseFlair_: Are you new to Mysteria Academy? I'm Anne, and this is Grea! Looking forward to studying together!
Anne, Belle of Mysteria.evoFlair_: I love this academy! Nothing would make me happier than if you learn to love it too!

Elder Mage of Dragonlore.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Dragon.
Fanfare: Earth Rite - Summon a Windblast Dragon instead.
Elder Mage of Dragonlore.baseFlair_: "True magic is that which lies beyond human knowledge, so dragons are a type of magic." The elder mage muttered the words to his acolytes. "There is value in understanding dragons, value that makes sacrificing one's human form a small price to pay."
Elder Mage of Dragonlore.evoFlair_: "Study the wings of the dragon to learn to fly, and study its fangs and claws to learn to rend the earth asunder." As the elder mage spoke these words, its scaled master roared. "One roar is worth a thousand words. This is true learning!"

Arch Summoner Erasmus.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower.
Arch Summoner Erasmus.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 7 damage to a random enemy follower.
Arch Summoner Erasmus.baseFlair_: No respect, I tell ya! No wonder the world's torn asunder! Never mind though—a job's a job. Now lemme warm up my staff.
Arch Summoner Erasmus.evoFlair_: Not a scratch, huh? Maybe I've lost my touch after all. Or maybe you're Death, waitin' to take what's owed, eh? Then gimme ya best, pal!

Silver Blade Golem.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Transform all Earth Sigil amulets in your hand into Veridic Rituals. Then perform Earth Rite (X): Put X Veridic Rituals into your hand. X equals the number of Earth Sigil amulets in play.
Silver Blade Golem.baseFlair_: As the world is filled with sin, so shall its veins be with a magical lifeforce. Its purpose is but one—with sin, comes punishment.
Silver Blade Golem.evoFlair_: All sins will meet their judgment without discrimination. Until the world has been purified once more, this armor shall not rest.

Forbidden Darkmage.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (1): Earth Sigil
Your leader can't take more than 4 damage at a time.
At the start of your turn, perform Earth Rite: If an earlier-played Earth Sigil amulet is destroyed this way, restore 1 defense to your leader.
At the end of your turn, draw a card.
----------
Fanfare: Gain +X/+X. X equals the number of allied Earth Sigil amulets destroyed this match. Deal Y damage to an enemy. Y equals this follower's attack.
Forbidden Darkmage.baseFlair_: Causality is equivalent to truth. Zero is zero. One hundred is one hundred. That balance is forever unchanging... or it was. However, now the forbidden arts make a mockery of causality.
Forbidden Darkmage.evoFlair_: Both nothingness and infinity are now possible. Equality can be rewritten, distorted, using a taboo practice capable of deceiving the heavens. Beyond the bounds of reason, the mage smiles calmly.

Daria, Infinity Witch.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Fanfare: Draw cards until your hand is full or you draw a card without Spellboost. Spellboost those cards 3 times.
Daria, Infinity Witch.baseFlair_:
Time, space, dimension, fate... These are normally linchpins of reality, but the grinning witch picked through them all like faulty locks.
"Uh, how about a real challenge?"
Daria, Infinity Witch.evoFlair_:
The grinning witch mocks the impossible as easily as she grasps the infinite. Unbridled and free, her power is always on display.
"With a bang and a boom!"

Fiery Embrace.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Destroy an enemy follower.
Fiery Embrace.baseFlair_: A single caress burns, but an embrace turns you to ash.

Zealot of Truth.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Storm.
Zealot of Truth.baseFlair_: Our way is truth. Yours is deception. Rid yourself of all but that which is true, and only the veracious will walk the earth.
Zealot of Truth.evoFlair_: Devour falsehoods beneath the shadow of rites. Seekers of truth shall eradicate the false, and all that remains shall be known as truth.

Aethereal Golem.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (2): Earth Sigil
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 6 damage to an enemy follower.
Aethereal Golem.baseFlair_:
For components within the prime field, used iron as the medium. Potential was middling. Notably, seems to command other golems. Not intentional result. Failure?
—Note on a Researcher's Desk
Aethereal Golem.evoFlair_:
Observation about golem: Uses magic elements itself and builds friends. My only talent is experimentation. Subject seems more human than myself.
—Note on a Researcher's Desk

Chimera.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
Chimera.baseFlair_: I created it for fun, but it ended up being three times meaner and hungrier than I expected. Talk about triple trouble. —A young alchemist
Chimera.evoFlair_: I raised it for fun, but it ended up being four times meaner and hungrier than I expected. How big does this thing get anyway? —A young alchemist

Anne, Mysterian Prodigy.baseEffect_:
Whenever you play a Mysteria card, subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Fanfare: Choose - Put an Anne's Summoning or Anne's Sorcery into your hand.
Anne, Mysterian Prodigy.baseFlair_: For the academy and everyone in it, I'm going to unleash my true power—no holding back! You're gonna see what I'm made of!
Anne, Mysterian Prodigy.evoFlair_: I'm not scared of a fight... What frightens me is the thought of my friends getting hurt. So I'll protect them, whatever it takes!

Riley, Hydroshaman.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Invocation: At the start of your turn, if X is at least 7, invoke this card.
When this follower comes into play, gain +X/+0. X equals the number of allied Naterran Great Trees you've played this match.
Riley, Hydroshaman.baseFlair_: O flowing, mutable water, master of gentle change and of conservation. Cardinal direction: West. Domain of the Undines. You who chill and irrigate. Please, rest easy. We are here for you.
Riley, Hydroshaman.evoFlair_: O flowing, mutable water, master of gentle change and of conservation. Cardinal direction: West. Domain of the Undines. You who chill and irrigate. It isn't that I crave power... but my companion is angry.

Mythril Golem.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
Spellboost: Deal 1 more.
Mythril Golem.baseFlair_: A mad alchemist's creation. Though he lost his master, he rages on, compelled to carry out the alchemist's orders.
Mythril Golem.evoFlair_: Staring at the white castle walls that conceal his chained master, he clenches his graveled fists and then strikes.

Daria, Dimensional Witch.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Fanfare: Banish all cards in your hand. Then draw 5 cards and Spellboost them 5 times.
Daria, Dimensional Witch.baseFlair_: A witch who left the world far behind and lives outside the confines of nature's laws. Her magic alters the face of reality.
Daria, Dimensional Witch.evoFlair_: With but a murmur, the witch transcends barriers and boundaries, as well as distances and dimensions. Her blazing scarlet eyes see futures others can't even dream of.

Wordwielder Ginger.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Change the cost of all followers in your hand to 0. Give allied followers the inability to attack the enemy leader. Give allied followers that come into play the inability to attack the enemy leader (if this card is still in play). Give your leader the following effect: Fanfare effects will not activate. These effects will last until the end of the turn this card is played.
Wordwielder Ginger.baseFlair_: A wordwielder who can curse a person, a city, or the very essence of a thing with but a single word. When her lips part, calamity slithers forth.
Wordwielder Ginger.evoFlair_: The words she whispers drift into the sky and coalesce into disaster. She yearns for tiny misfortunes, silent death, and widespread ruin.

Giant Chimera.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal a pool of 3 damage divided between all enemies. First deal damage to the earliest-played enemy follower. (If there is enough damage in the pool, deal damage equal to that follower's defense.) Then deal damage to other enemy followers in the order they were played. If any damage is left in the pool afterward, deal it to the enemy leader.
Spellboost: Deal 1 more damage.
Giant Chimera.baseFlair_: Their grimoires were comprehensive, and their experiments were superlative. But a god named caprice would make it all crumble to dust. —Terminus Necessarius, Chapter 3
Giant Chimera.evoFlair_: Mankind's self-guided destiny is worthless before the caprice that gods employ. Our endeavors, therefore, lie prostrate before the whims of the gods. —Terminus Necessarius, Chapter 12

Unbodied Witch.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Select a card in your hand, and put copies of it into your hand until it is full. (A hand can hold 9 cards.)
At the start of your turn, evolve this follower.
Unbodied Witch.evoEffect_:
(Doesn't have Ward.)
Strike: Spellboost the cards in your hand 10 times.
Unbodied Witch.baseFlair_: A voice to agitate all within my skull. A groan. She had reconstructed the very essence of my being. It was then that I had a realization: "Yes, magic, in truth, is..." —Grimy scrap of paper
Unbodied Witch.evoFlair_: A voice, a groan, and the tune's meaning gradually became clear to me. She reconstructed me as I should be. Ah, I'm through, but how very wonderful... —Grimy scrap of paper

Ginger, Accursed Word.baseEffect_:
During your turn, whenever an allied follower evolves, subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Fanfare: Put a Ginger's Curse into your hand.
Ginger, Accursed Word.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - At the start of your turn, put a Ginger's Curse into your hand. (This effect is not stackable.)
Ginger, Accursed Word.baseFlair_: A wordwielder who would bring forth disaster. A demon who would bring forth unspeakable terror. Through their fated encounter, an exchanging of words—the birth of love. For this is Ville de l'Amour, a town brimming with the miracles of love. —Ville de l'Amour, An Encounter
Ginger, Accursed Word.evoFlair_: A wordwielder who believed not in true love. She uttered to the demon, "If your love was born of a curse, perish before my sight!" The demon fled, yet disaster remained imminent. —Ville de l'Amour, A Parting

Final Curse.baseEffect_: Deal 8 damage to an enemy follower.

Flame Destroyer.baseEffect_: Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
Flame Destroyer.baseFlair_: Come hither and hearken well. The sound of my shackles shattering heralds the beginning of the end.
Flame Destroyer.evoFlair_: With rebirth comes metamorphosis. Pity none shall be left to see it once my rapturous flames have scorched this earth.

Clarke, Knowledge Seeker.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Summon an Earth Essence. Put a Veridic Ritual into your hand.
----------
Fanfare: Recover 10 play points.
Fanfare: Earth Rite - Banish all cards in your hand, then draw 9 cards.
Clarke, Knowledge Seeker.baseFlair_: The unknown exists within the known. How long has it been since I last set foot in this land? One must consider the past to uncover the future... And as I am now, I am confident that I am capable of doing just that.
Clarke, Knowledge Seeker.evoFlair_: By refining the known, one can discover the unknown. The quest for knowledge is never-ending. Constant effort will yield success.

Kuon, Founder of Onmyodo.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Fanfare: Summon a Celestial Shikigami, Demonic Shikigami, and Paper Shikigami.
Whenever an allied Demonic Shikigami or Paper Shikigami comes into play, give it Storm.
Kuon, Founder of Onmyodo.evoEffect_: Whenever an allied Demonic Shikigami or Paper Shikigami comes into play, give it Storm.
Kuon, Founder of Onmyodo.baseFlair_:
A noisy crowd of people is worth less than the sum of its parts. Those things you call "knowledge" and "wisdom" are destined to fade away like the morning dew. (What a waste of time. How about we end this?)
I command the five elements. (You're finished.)
Kuon, Founder of Onmyodo.evoFlair_:
(You crowd together like that to study?)
(Everything you've learned is worthless.)
(What a waste of time. How about we end this?)
I command the five elements. (You're finished.)

Regalore, Steel Chimera.baseEffect_:
Fusion: Machina
For each card fused to this follower, subtract 2 from its cost.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Return all allied Machina followers (excluding Regalore, Steel Chimera) to your hand. Summon an Assembly Droid for each follower returned to your hand. Then, give all allied Assembly Droids +X/+X and Rush. X equals half the number of cards fused to this card rounded up.
Regalore, Steel Chimera.baseFlair_: After they saw their creation shake the earth, call the rain, stoke new fire, and summon old wind, the machinists rejoiced. They had created a being that could subjugate nature itself—never mind the magical perversion it left in its wake to do so.
Regalore, Steel Chimera.evoFlair_:
Gaian crown, aquan claws, flamen tail, aeroan horns... It's composed of the same elements as we. To pervert creation is folly, and I shall teach you of your ignorance, foolish cretins.
—Uhlein, Grand Magus

Prophetess of Creation.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (10): Draw a card. Put a Prophetess of Creation into your deck. Recover 9 play points.
----------
Invocation: At the end of your turn, invoke this card if you've played cards that originally cost 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, and 10 play points this match.
Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
Can't be destroyed by effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from effects.)
Prophetess of Creation.evoEffect_:
Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
Can't be destroyed by effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from effects.)
Prophetess of Creation.baseFlair_: By the light of the first star descended a second revelation: Come it thrice or four times again, judge not man's oft-repeated folly. Give naught but as oft-repeated forgiveness. The prophetess bowed her head, pledging her five senses to the gods.
Prophetess of Creation.evoFlair_: On the gods' six-sided checkerboard, she was the seventh piece. Buffeted by the advent of eight disasters, movements of rival players, she wove her way around the board guided by the flickering light of nine planets. Reaching the other side at last, she was kinged tenfold.

Teo, Prophetess of Creation.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (10): Draw a card. Put a Teo, Prophetess of Creation into your deck. Recover 9 play points.
----------
Invocation: At the end of your turn, invoke this card if you've played cards that originally cost 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, and 10 play points this match.
Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
Can't be destroyed by effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from effects.)
Teo, Prophetess of Creation.evoEffect_:
Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
Can't be destroyed by effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from effects.)

(This card will be treated as Prophetess of Creation.)
Teo, Prophetess of Creation.baseFlair_: By the light of the first star descended a second revelation: Come it thrice or four times again, judge not man's oft-repeated folly. Give naught but as oft-repeated forgiveness. The prophetess bowed her head, pledging her five senses to the gods.
Teo, Prophetess of Creation.evoFlair_: On the gods' six-sided checkerboard, she was the seventh piece. Buffeted by the advent of eight disasters, movements of rival players, she wove her way around the board guided by the flickering light of nine planets. Reaching the other side at last, she was kinged tenfold.

Anne's Sorcery.baseEffect_:
Deal X damage to an enemy.
X equals the number of other Mysteria cards you've played this match.
Anne's Sorcery.baseFlair_:
"I use my powers for the sake of others—I'll protect Mysteria Academy no matter what!"
—Anne, Mysterian Prodigy

Dimension Shift.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Take an extra turn after this one.
Dimension Shift.baseFlair_: No creature or creation on heaven or earth can bind her.

Prophecy of Doom.baseEffect_:
Spellboost: Subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Give the enemy leader the following effect: At the end of your turn, deal 7 damage to your leader.
Prophecy of Doom.baseFlair_: Bringer of disasters, my words will destroy you. —Runie, Destiny's Bard
